name: Chainalysis
description: Chainalysis is one of the fastest growing companies in the cryptocurrency space. Our cryptocurrency investigation and compliance software is used by the world’s leading law enforcement agencies, regulators, and businesses as they combat fraud, human trafficking, money laundering, and other illicit activity involving cryptocurrencies. With offices in New York, Washington D.C., London, and Copenhagen, we are backed by Accel, Benchmark and other leading names in venture capital. Our mission is to build trust in blockchains.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Jan Møller
team.bioHtml: I am a senior IT-developer with a proven track-record of successfully delivering high quality IT-solutions on time

team.name: jonathan levin
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder and COO at Chainalysis. Economist hacking on radical financial privacy and transparency.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Michael Grønager
team.bioHtml: CEO of Chainalysis, Technologist, public speaker, bitcoin expert. Board member at a Top500 Super Computer Center - NSC, Sweden.

team.bioHtml: An energetic, self-starting  Recruiter Coordinator with 5+  of customer service in a fast-paced, high volume environment.

team.bioHtml: Sales @Chainalysis | Formerly: Growth @Servato | @Venture for America 2013 Fellow | @Cornell University Alum

jobs.title: AP/AR Specialist
jobs.description:
The finance team at Chainalysis splits their time between fine-tuning the details and evaluating the 30,000 foot view of our business. Our job is to help the company plan for growth by investing in the right resources and audit our expenditures and revenues to ensure we’re being fiscally responsible. 

The AP/AR Specialist is skilled at transitioning from a taskmaster focused on accuracy to an advocate for our customers and employees navigating the process. We measure success by timely and accurate completion of invoicing, payments, month-end close, and reimbursements.

**In one year you’ll know you were successful if…**

- **You independently manage many day-to-day accounting tasks and our accounting records are maintained in accordance with GAAP principles**
- Our Accounts Receivables collection process is effective and you're the go-to person for customer questions related to A/R
- Have setup a dependable short-term AP & AR forecast for our quarterly cashflow forecasts
- **You assist in the Accounts Payable workflow and reconcile corporate credit cards on a monthly basis**
- Month-end close runs smoothly and efficiently thanks to your support
- **The Accounting and Finance team knows they can count on you to pitch in on other projects as needed  **
- Expensify is organized, automated, and well-utilized by all of our employees. And, people are reimbursed quickly and efficiently. 
- You've identified and automated bottlenecks in our day to day operations that make us more efficient.

**A background like this helps:**  

- A bachelor’s degree in Accounting 
- Experience independently owning the entirety or parts of the Accounts Payables and Receivables process
- Understanding of accounting principles under GAAP
- Good discernment regarding sensitive issues and professional communication habits  
- Google Suite and Excel are a must! Netsuite experience strongly preferred! Expensify a plus!

At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.

**You belong here.**

At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability and experience. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. We can’t wait to meet you.

jobs.title: Federal Account Executive
jobs.description:
The Sales team responsible for our public sector customers around the world is driven by our mission to make the world a safer place by tracking and investigating activities that involve cryptocurrencies like human trafficking, terrorist financing, and money-laundering. 

Our US Federal Account Executives can quickly establish trust within government customers and are experts on navigating government sales processes. We measure success by new business and account expansion revenue. 

**In one year you’ll know you were successful if…**

- You exceeded your quota and substantially increased our foothold in the US government
- Customers seek you out for your cryptocurrency investigations expertise 
- You’ve built a diverse pipeline of opportunities resulting in consistent and accurate forecasting

**A background like this helps:**  

- B2B SaaS sales focused on the US federal government (investigations, proprietary data, or cybersecurity preferred)
- Experience leading the entire sales process from discovery calls to contract negotiation to closing deals 

At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.

**You belong here.**

At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability and experience. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. We can’t wait to meet you.

jobs.title: General Application
jobs.description:
Chainalysis is one of the fastest growing companies in the cryptocurrency space. Our cryptocurrency investigation and compliance software is used by the world’s leading law enforcement agencies, regulators, and businesses as they combat fraud, human trafficking, money laundering, and other illicit activity involving cryptocurrencies. With offices in New York, Washington D.C., London, and Copenhagen, we are backed by Accel, Benchmark and other leading names in venture capital. Our mission is to build trust in blockchains.

While we may not have a specific opening that currently aligns with your experience, we'd love to stay in touch. 

Please use this application portal to let us know where you think you'd fit in at Chainalysis and how you can make an impact. We'll reach out if one of our teams could use your expertise! 

**You belong here. **  
At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. jobs.title: Global Controller
jobs.description:
The finance team at Chainalysis splits their time between fine-tuning the details and evaluating 30,000 foot view of our business. Our job is to help the company plan for growth by investing in the right resources and audit our expenditures and revenues to ensure we’re being fiscally responsible. 

The Global Controller will be a pro at implementing processes and executing the long-term vision for the Accounting Team. We measure success by how effective and thorough our policies are enacted throughout the company and the impact of those policies on the overall business. 

**In one year you’ll know you were successful if…**

- Accounting operations like Billing, A/R, A/P, G/L, Payroll, and Revenue Recognition are running smoothly
- Monthly, quarterly, and year-end close processes and both internal and external financial statements are completed on-time and in accordance with GAAP standards.
- We’ve successfully completed our first US audit.
- You’ve implemented Netsuite enhancements and set a roadmap for future system implementations and enhancements to existing systems.
- The team has clear and relevant financial controls and guidelines.
- Chainalysis's accounting practices and policies are compliant with both GAAP and ASC606 standards as well as other relevant global standards in our entities across the EU and Asia.
- You've built and coached a high-performing Accounting team that has scaled with the business.

**A background like this helps:**  

- You've led an Accounting function at a growing SaaS company before and can tell us about how you scaled and improved the Accounting policies and practices there.
- You've already worked at a public company or Big 4 audit firm.
- Netsuite, Expensify, GSuite, and Salesforce are in your tech stack.
- Advanced understanding of GAAP regulatory and ASC606 compliance standards.
- You can give us direct examples of how you built and evolved the processes, controls, and systems at a growth-stage company.
- Experience managing relationships with external auditors.
- BA/BS degree required; MBA a plus
- CPA strongly preferred

At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.

**You belong here.**

At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability and experience. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. We can’t wait to meet you.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
Chainalysis is looking for high-energy, driven professionals with sound business acumen and natural sales instincts to join, and help build, our Sales organization. Your role will be managing a pipeline of both inbound and outbound leads by contacting and developing relationships with potential customers. You will boost sales and contribute to our long-term business growth.


This position will be based out of New York.

Responsibilities:
*You will be responsible for prospecting, qualifying and creating sales opportunities for Chainalysis’ global sales teams.
*You will be dedicated to pursuing some of the largest and most recognized brands in the crypto and blockchain space.
*You will represent the front line of the company's sales and marketing efforts, playing an important role in growing the business by starting the sales process and helping set up the sales teams for success.

Job Requirements:
*Excellent written and verbal communication skills
*Persistence and ability to focus on the task at hand
*Versatile, result-oriented, and motivated to drive new business
*Track record of over-achieving goals, in the classroom, playing field, or business
*1-3 years of work experience, start-up or trained sales experience
*A strong desire to grow your career in sales
*Strong knowledge and deep passion of cryptocurrencies and blockchain preferred

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
The Engineers working at Chainalysis work on systems that are the highest fidelity of risk data within a crypto business. Our job is to bring transparency to the cryptocurrency ecosystem and build trust in the blockchain. We build systems that detect fraud in real-time.

The Chainalysis KYT (Know Your Transaction) team is building a suite of compliance products for cryptocurrency businesses and traditional financial institutions. Software Engineers on the KYT team thrive on not just designing and implementing complex systems but also operating them. We measure our success by how well we enable our customers to fight crime and handle compliance

**In one year you’ll know you were successful if…**

- You have successfully built cloud-native data ingest and aggregation processes that intakes gigabytes of data per day
- You’ve added features to our product suite that detect activities for market manipulation, fraud, behavioural patterning, and more 
- You have built a scalable API service on AWS that handles up to 600 requests per second
- You have helped the team to modernize our stack to a streaming architecture
- You have debugged production issues across multiple systems and microservices

**A background like this helps:**  

- Love to build systems that are elegant abstractions over crypto transactions
- Designed and implemented cloud-native micro services based distributed systems
- Have built data pipeline infrastructure  
- Experience in designing and implementing event-driven architecture
- Have bias to ship
- Take pride in materializing product ideas to production
- Experience in JVM. We mostly use Java but also appreciate other languages.
- Experience with Terraform and Kubernetes is valuable
- Interest in cryptocurrencies

At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.

**You belong here.**

At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability and experience. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. We can’t wait to meet you.

jobs.title: Sr. Software Engineer (Java)
jobs.description:
Chainalysis builds trust in blockchains between people, businesses, and governments. Our Blockchain Intelligence Platform powers our compliance and investigation software for the world’s top institutions.  With offices in NY, D.C., and Copenhagen, Chainalysis is global and backed by Benchmark and other leading names in venture capital.

We are looking for Java Developers to help create the next generation of cryptocurrency analysis tools. This position is located in New York.
 

Description:

We are looking for a Java developer who is comfortable working with frameworks, like Spring, and interested in managing the interchange of data between servers and users. Your primary focus will be the development of server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.

Our teams are self-organizing with the ability to be creative, choose their own technology stack and tools, and actively shape the company's direction.

Requirements
The ideal candidate should be a passionate, self-motivated, team player with experience working in agile and a willingness to work and learn in a collaborative environment.

- At least 5+ years of experience in Java

- Spring and Spring Boot framework

- Web application security (Spring security, OAuth)

- Postgres or other relational databases

- ORMs (Hibernate)

- Experience with RESTful APIs

- Git (we use GitHub) and peer reviews

Nice to have:

- Knowledge of cryptocurrencies at a technical level

- Working knowledge of regulatory compliance within the cryptocurrency sector

You belong here. 
At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability and experience. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. We can’t wait to meet you.  

Perks & Benefits
We offer a comprehensive benefits package including competitive salaries, stock options for senior roles, medical, dental and vision - which cover domestic partners as well - plus life and disability coverage, 20 vacation days, and a 401K plan.  Chainalysists also get to participate in our annual Huddle, a week-long destination event that promotes team-building, professional development, and fun! In the office, you’ll have access to a Mac or PC of your choice and a fully stocked kitchen.
